trans-unit.source: You enhance the damage of another attack spell with an extra charge of energy so that it deals 1 additional point of damage. Alternatively, you attack a target within long range by projecting a flare of raw magic that inflicts 4 points of damage.
trans-unit.target: You enhance the damage of another attack spell with an extra charge of energy so that it deals 1 additional point of damage. Alternatively, you attack a target within long range by projecting a flare of raw magic that inflicts 4 points of damage.

trans-unit.source: Enabler for enhancement; action for long-range attack.
trans-unit.target: Enabler for enhancement; action for long-range attack.
